titles.title: A bill to provide that certain disclaimers shall not be treated as transfers for purposes of Federal estate and gift taxation.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/22/1987--Introduced. Prohibits certain disclaimers of property interests created by a gift, devise, or bequest from being treated as transfers (and thus taxable) for estate and gift tax purposes. Applies to written disclaimers made before December 9, 1980, with respect to interests created before November 15, 1958.
